    • ltcrcbd

Analysis of Line x Tester data laid out in RCBD experimental design

Source: R/ltcrcbd.R
ltcrcbd.Rd

Used for analyzing the line x tester data containing only crosses laid out in RCBD design

ltcrcbd(data, replication, line, tester, y)

Arguments

data

dataframe containing following variables
replication

number of replications
line

number of lines
tester

number of testers
y

trait of interest

Value

Results of line by tester analysis

Details

Analyzing the line by tester data containing only crosses which are evaluated in Randomized Complete Block Design (RCBD).

Author

Nandan Patil

Examples

library(gpbStat)
data(rcbdlt)
results2 = ltcrcbd(rcbdlt, replication, line, tester, yield)

#> 
#> Analysis of Line x Tester:  yield 
results2
